title: A Handful of Coppers: Collected Early Stories, Vol. 1: Heroic Fantasy
description: Contents:Aynber“The Fair, the Foul & the Foolish”“Wizard's Bounty”“Stormraven”“The Valley of the Troll”“The Road to Jarawen” (unpublished)“A Handful of Coppers” (unpublished)Colum mac Donal“Night of the Valkings”“The Ring of Brodgar”“The Iron Stone”“The Fair in Emain Macha”Damon“Damon: A Prologue” (unpublished)“Wings Over Antar”“Dark God Laughing” (unpublished)Liavek“The Rat's Alley Shuffle”“The Skin & Knife Game” (collaboration with Lee Barwood)
author: Charles de Lint
